charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around
town when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard the roar of a crowd from
the town square.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1101_0200_:
When [Name:PlayerNickname ] went to have a
look, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Ryuki giving a street performance
and singing for his audience.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_0300_: Oh yeah! I’ve been rocked to the core!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1101_0400_:
The crowd—and Ryuki—worked up a sweat in all
their excitement, and looked like they were having
a blast.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1101_0500_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] called out to the
satisfied-looking Ryuki.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0401_0700_:
Hey! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You heard me
belting it out on the mic, eh?
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0402_0900_:
Hey! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Those were the
sounds of us belting it out!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_1000_:
I actually use dragon Pokémon’s cries as an
inspiration for my singing style.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_1100_:
That’s why the deep bass of his explosions are
a perfect match for my singing. They reverberate
all the way through to the heart!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0401_1300_:
Whoops, I forgot to introduce you! This is my
partner Pokémon, Turtonator!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0402_1500_:
Oh, right! I forgot to introduce you! This is my
partner Pokémon, Turtonator!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_1600_:
I wanted to play gigs with him on Pasio, so we
became a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_1700_:
His shell is something else. If you apply a bit of
pressure to it...
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_1800_:
it explodes, just like that! And THAT’s why I need
him when I play shows!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_1900_:
And on top of that, the pattern on his shell looks
like a star, right? I scouted him for my band the
second I saw him.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_2100_:
Come to think of it, I guess I’ve always been the
type to fall in love at first sight.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0401_2300_:
You wanna hear the story of me, the guy who
rushes headlong into everything, and his Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0402_2500_:
You wanna hear the story of me, the guy who
rushes headlong into everything, and his Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_2600_:
I became obsessed with the idea of becoming a
musician, and I left my hometown.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_2700_:
My family and everyone from my town was
cheering me on.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_2800_:
So I swore I’d make my dream come true—my
dream of becoming an overseas sensation!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_2900_:
Nobody was buying my music for a while... But
through it all, my babies kept the passion burning
and kept me going.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_3100_:
I fell for every one of my babies at first sight. ALL
of them are the best partner Pokémon I could ever
ask for, not just Turtonator.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_3200_:
And, of course, all the fans who fell for ME at first
sight as I was belting it out on stage are the
best, too!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_3300_:
Someday the whole world WILL be mine, and I’ll
make everyone proud!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_3400_:
And, of course, I’ll do it while traveling the world
and scouting more members for my band!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0301_3500_:
Did you meet Turtonator during your
travels too?
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0401_3600_:
Oh yeah! Me and him belting it out at each other
is one of my favorite memories!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0402_3800_:
It is! Nothing beats traveling to new places and
finding new band members!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_3900_:
I bet you’ve fallen for a Pokémon at first sight too
and scouted it for your team. Am I right?
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0401_4100_:
Yeah! I love that energy! You really get what’s
important, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_0402_4300_:
I get it. You’re the type who likes to play it cool!
I guess I’m more reckless.
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_4400_:
There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio, so I
guess it’ll be hard to scout new members...
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_4500_: but I think I’ve found my next big thing!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_4600_:
I get now why you’re so popular with all the other
Trainers that specialize in Dragon-type Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0190_00_ryuki/2301_1201_4700_:
So, Pasio’s very own rock star—wanna be
best buds?
